column1: Villabate (Sicilian: Villabbati) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Palermo in the Italian region Sicily
column2: located about 8 kilometres (5 mi) southeast of Palermo. As of 31 December 2004
column4: 441 and an area of 3.8 square kilometres (1.5 sq mi).Villabate borders the following municipalities: Ficarazzi
